EmailTemplate.name: NotifyQuoteAccountManager
EmailTemplate.subject: Quote Expiration Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__c.CreatedBy},
NOTICE: Opportunity: {!Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__c.NokiaCPQ_Opportunity_Number__c}, will expire in 2 weeks on {!Apttus_Proposal__Proposal__c.Apttus_Proposal__Valid_Until_Date__c}. Please review opportunity and take necessary steps to progress, or close the opportunity.
